roleset.name: cause to stop, stopped, completed
roleset.note: FINISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'finish' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'finished' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of Vncls stop-55.4-1. (from finish.01-v)
FINISHED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from finished.01-j)

example.name: arg1 as pro-controlled S
example.text: Moreover, Suez-1 had just finished *PRO*-1 winning an even larger battle last year for control of Societe Generale de Belgique.
example.arg: *PRO*-1 winning an even larger battle last year for control of Societe Generale de Belgique

example.name: with an agentive intentional finisher
example.text: The Senate's public gallery was packed with Judge Hastings' supporters , who erupted into applause after he finished his argument.

example.name: Adjectival rel: finished
example.text: It was a pathetic display and in the end my patience was finished so I walked on stage and gave a little reminder of what Memorial Day is actually about .

roleset.name: terminate, conclude or terminate
roleset.note: FINISH-V NOTES: in WSJ corpus, primarily of stocks. (from finish.02-v)
FINISH-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to 'finish.02-v'. Vn class stop-55.4-1. Framed by Katie. (from finish.01-n)

role.descr: MNR up, down, or unchanged, or degree of change

example.name: manner and extent
example.text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average, which had jumped 41.60 points on Tuesday, drifted on either side of its previous close and finished with a gain of just 0.82 at 2645.90.
example.arg: The Dow Jones Industrial Average, which had jumped 41.60 points on Tuesday,

example.name: Thing finished
example.text: a perfect finish to her performance

roleset.name: apply a finish, as to wood

example.name: all args
example.text: John finished his new armoire in a lovely shade of chartreuse.
example.arg: in a lovely shade of chartreuse

roleset.name: completing a contest of some sort (often a race)
roleset.note: FINISH-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from finish.02-n)

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: People who are recommending De Gendt at 76 Mo are forgetting his Alpe D'huez finish last year

example.name: tricky arg1
example.text: Also 100 years of the the Galibier which is being climbed twice with one side for the first time ever , i love the climbing stages , the two stand out stages for -LRB- and i am going to book time off work to watch them -RRB- are stage 18 with the mountain finish at Galibier and the next day just 109 km but with the Alpe Duez finish with Galibier in the middle .

example.name: arg1, TMP, ADJ
example.text: The Champs - Elysees finish last year with Cav in the background winning was up there with most amazing cycling things i have seen , along with Lance on the Alpe Duez 2001 -LRB- The look -RRB- , Lance going past Ulrich in the TT , most of Pantani 's climbs holding down on the bottom bars and most of what Cancellara does
example.arg: with Cav in the background winning

example.name: with arg2
example.text: His biggest victory so far must obviously be his first place finish at the 2012 ESWC last November, good for about $20,000.

roleset.name: to bring (a project) to completion
roleset.note: FINISH_UP-V NOTES: See VNcls stop-55.4-1, but verb particle construction isn't present in class. (from finish.04-v)

example.name: Journalism
example.text: It could be that they-1 're not actually involved in [*PRO*-1]-2 finishing up *PRO*-2 writing one of the opinions.

roleset.name: finish completely
roleset.note: FINISH_OFF-V NOTES: Frame file for 'finish off' based on instances in Webtext 2.5. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to finish.01. Framed by Claire (from finish.05-v)

example.name: Eliminate
example.text: Congratulations for *PRO* having Peres , and shalom to you from Sharon whose health you pray for *T*-1 so he can finish off what *ICH*-3 *T*-2 remains of Hamas .
[I]-1'd like *PRO*-1 to finish out until my actual retirement when I was ready to quit but, yeah, I have some doubts.
example.arg: until my actual retirement when I was ready to quit
